body_html: @martinwicke thanks a lot, appreciated. I've tried many things but nothing has worked so far. I'm hopping the guys from anaconda keep up they word and resolve this issue with the next release of anaconda. They said the next release would be able to build packages from source. Let's hope so.

body: @martinwicke thanks a lot, appreciated. I've tried many things but nothing has worked so far. I'm hopping the guys from anaconda keep up they word and resolve this issue with the next release of anaconda. They said the next release would be able to build packages from source. Let's hope so.
